title: Meter Status Function Block
description: The METER_STAT function block is designed to track and manage the status of a meter, including daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly measurements. It resets the current and last measurements based on the specified input conditions and the date of last run.
name: METER_STAT

input.name: IN
input.description: The input value measured by the meter.

input.name: DI
input.description: The current date corresponding to the measurement.

input.name: RST
input.description: A boolean flag to indicate whether to reset the current measurements.

in/out.name: Last_Day
in/out.description: The value of the last day measurement.

in/out.name: Current_Day
in/out.description: The value of the current day measurement.

in/out.name: Last_Week
in/out.description: The value of the last week measurement.

in/out.name: Current_Week
in/out.description: The value of the current week measurement.

in/out.name: Last_Month
in/out.description: The value of the last month measurement.

in/out.name: Current_Month
in/out.description: The value of the current month measurement.

in/out.name: Last_Year
in/out.description: The value of the last year measurement.

in/out.name: Current_Year
in/out.description: The value of the current year measurement.
